title: Jack the Ripper Skin for Katarina
body: She's got the red and black and daggers. Maybe call it "Kat the Ripper"?

replies.body: Some may find the concept offensive given the circumstances of who Jack the ripper was and what he did. Perhaps "Kat the Shredder" but keep the similar outfit.
That criticism is fair; I did not think that through in retrospect.

> [{quoted}](name=eMSequel,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=02P96klo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-27T06:37:27.282+0000)
>
> Some may find the concept offensive given the circumstances of who Jack the ripper was and what he did. Perhaps "Kat the Shredder" but keep the similar outfit.
